question: Which State Cabinet approved 'Electronics System Design and Manufacturing (KESDM) Policy 2017-22' to promote electronic design and manufacturing in the state?
explanation: Karnataka State Cabinet approved 'Karnataka Electronics System Design and Manufacturing (KESDM) Policy 2017-22' to promote electronic design and manufacturing in the state. Under this policy, Karnataka State Government will encourage start-ups involved in electronic design and manufacturing by providing them with right ecosystem.
